wikipedia_page.main: Major General Sir Charles Edward Corkran,  (20 August 1872 – 9 January 1939) was a senior British Army officer who served as Major-General commanding the Brigade of Guards and General Officer Commanding London District from 1928 to 1932.

response: *Major-General Sir Charles Corkran,  1928–1932 late Grenadier Guards
